title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 

(Taoiseach) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (taoiseach) order 2025

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Taoiseach with effect from the date 
opposite mention of the person. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [298] 3 

Deirdre Gillane 

Pat McParland 

Diarmuid Lynch
text_norm: 2 person mentioned schedule particular whose address deposited office department taoiseach appointed special adviser taoiseach effect date opposite mention person notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 13th june 2025 298 3 deirdre gillane pat mcparland diarmuid lynch
